doc:
Benjamin Hendrickson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benjamin_Hendrickson 0 Benjamin Hendrickson (August 26, 1950 – July 3, 2006) was an American actor known for playing Harold "Hal" Munson, Jr., the Chief of Detectives for the mythical town of Oakdale on the daytime soap opera As the World Turns. Benjamin_Hendrickson ( August_26_,_1950 – July_3_,_2006 ) was an_American_actor known for playing Harold_"_Hal_"_Munson_,_Jr. , the_Chief of Detectives for the_mythical_town of Oakdale on the_daytime_soap_opera As the_World Turns .
